comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Cant wait for the 1st debate. Put her in her place. Invite those families that she doenst care about from the Benghazi attacks and put them front and center so she has to look at them in the eyes and say they didn't matter.

replies.author: Shane
replies.text: On Hilary's worst day, she is way smarter than trump. FYI, she is a real lady not like your toilet mouth trump.

replies.text: Lmao your an idiot. Keep on believing the lies.
